document_data.name: Suliyar
document_data.mainbody: '''Suliyar''' was a [[rakshasa]] rajah in service to [[Set]] in [[Mulhorand]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Suliyar was a member of the [[Fangs of Set]]. He was always accompanied by four rakshasa bodyguards, one whom [[Hodkamset]] wanted to use in his plot. He usually stalked the streets of [[Skuld]] in search of [[human]]s to kill. Suliyar posed as a mercenary.
document_data.History: Suliyar was exiled from his homeland east of [[Raurin]], where he had ruled a great rakshasa tribe. He was found by [[Nekiset]], who recruited him to the service of Set.
document_data.Personality: Suliyar was a proud and savage creature. He believed that helping Set would grant him the rule of a great empire. He enjoyed killing humans, especially initiates of [[Horus-Re]].
document_data.Relationship: Suliyar did not care much for his companions in the Fangs of Set but sometimes found their deviousness amusing.
